thread.title: Planetarium Labs Introduces Immortal Statue NFT Collection for Immortal Rising 2 Players - Whitelist Now Open | The Manila Times

author: GlobeNewswire
title: Planetarium Labs Introduces Immortal Statue NFT Collection for Immortal Rising 2 Players - Whitelist Now Open | The Manila Times
text:
Limited-Edition NFT Drop Grants Players Exclusive Rewards, Token Airdrops, and Prestige
Singapore, Feb. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Planetarium Labs , a pioneer in Web3 gaming innovation, has unveiled the highly anticipated Immortal Statue NFT Collection for Immortal Rising 2 , providing players with unprecedented in-game benefits and exclusive token airdrops. Following the resounding success of the game's Play-to-Airdrop (P2A) launchpool where over 9 million SoulBound Tokens (SBTs) were claimed through the Daily Check-In mission-this limited-edition NFT collection marks the next evolution in player rewards and engagement.
Designed as a gateway to legendary status, the Immortal Statue NFT Collection features two meticulously crafted tiers:
The Exalted Immortal Bust - Priced at $50 worth of $IMX per NFT, this NFT unlocks daily in-game perks, token airdrops, and exclusive NFT claims to enhance gameplay. The Divine Immortal Effigy - The Divine Immortal Effigy cannot be purchased directly-it is granted randomly at a 20% rate to those who buy an Exalted Immortal Bust. It offers 1.5Ã— enhanced rewards, a boosted $IMT airdrop, and a prestigious status reserved for a select few. The whitelist application period will run from February 27, 9AM to March 6, 9AM (UTC), allowing dedicated players and collectors to secure a Guaranteed Whitelist (GTD WL) spot. The process, facilitated through Alphabot, ensures a streamlined application experience where users connect their wallets, verify engagement, and share their excitement on social media. How to Get Whitelisted:
